channel.title: Gauntlet Comics—Escape from Dino Island: Lake of the Lost
channel.description:
![Dinosaur Island|329x500](upload://kf1ty0m7gB7Mfb6gOunn23iOCbZ.jpeg) **Gauntlet Comics—Escape from Dino Island: Lake of the Lost** (2 sessions on Fridays in October) In the 1940s, a team of young superheroes detonated an artifact containing powerful temporal energies over a major lake to the north of New Gauntlet City. Since then, the lake has been known as the Lake of the Lost, and rumors swirl of long-extinct creatures reappearing on an island in the midst of the it. But only now, in the present day, will you and your fellow castaways discover the truth... if it doesn't swallow you whole first!
This is a two-part series of [Escape from Dino Island](https://samnite.itch.io/escapefromdinoisland), set in the [Gauntlet Comics](https://gauntletcomics.miraheze.org/wiki/Main_Page) continuity. The game is a PbtA game inspired by media like Jurassic Park and Lost. Our series will take additional inspiration from comics like The War That Time Forgot and Ka-Zar. [date=2020-10-23 time=19:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-10-23 time=22:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] Session 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MGpdVcrhNuVkndWHJNd [date=2020-10-30 time=19:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-10-30 time=22:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] Session 2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MGpdi38nZy0ouWE3N9x

item.title: Gauntlet Comics—Escape from Dino Island: Lake of the Lost
item.dc:creator: @Alexi_Sarge
item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

Gauntlet Comics—Escape from Dino Island: Lake of the Lost (Session 2/2)
Starring: @jonjongrim, @RichRogers, Sam Z, @chris_l
In the exciting conclusion of our two-parter, not everyone makes it off the island. Dr. Kal Sharma reveals how far he’s willing to go for knowledge. Cori sounds the alarm as a fire-breathing T-Rex attack! Alya takes a leap of faith. And Freya grapples with whether the outside world has anything left to offer her.

Read full topic
item.source: Gauntlet Comics—Escape from Dino Island: Lake of the Lost

item.title: Gauntlet Comics—Escape from Dino Island: Lake of the Lost
item.dc:creator: @Alexi_Sarge
item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

Gauntlet Comics—Escape from Dino Island: Lake of the Lost (Session 1/2)
Starring: @jonjongrim, @RichRogers, Sam Z, @chris_l
A research expedition funded by the Optimax Industries brings Kal Sharma the doctor, Alya Gabbai the soldier, and Cori Tauris the kid to a mysterious island in a lake north of New Gauntlet City… where they quickly encounter dinosaurs, dangers, and the castaway survivor Freya Forrester. What other secrets is the island hiding… and can everyone in this group be trusted?

Read full topic
item.source: Gauntlet Comics—Escape from Dino Island: Lake of the Lost
